content: of the round round 6 - knit round 7 - *knit 3 k2tog* repeat from * to the end of the round round 8 - knit round 9 - *knit 2 k2tog* repeat from * to the end of the round round 10 - knit round 11 - *knit 1 k2tog* repeat from * to the end of the round round 12 - knit round 13 - k2tog all the way around and then cut 6 tail thread it on a tapestry feed it through remaining stitches and cinch up hole and weave in any ends
